import { CalendarDaysIcon, HandRaisedIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline' import React from 'react' const Newsletter = () => { return (

Subscribe to our newsletter.

Stay connected with all the latest updates, exclusive offers, and insider insights by subscribing to our newsletter.

Weekly articles
Stay in the loop with all the latest updates and insider news from Hotel Midas Regency
No spam
no spam, just valuable insights and exciting news from Hotel Midas Regency.
) } export default Newsletter
